index.wantHelpLong: It luiks like this is the first time that ye'v uised the NFC Ring Control app. Wid ye like some heelp?
index.whatDoYouWantToDoToday: Whit dae ye want tae dae theday?
index.createDescription: Write ae new action oan yer ring
index.createDescriptionMore: Uise this page tae write new content or actions til yer NFC Ring. Ye'll need tae ken whit ye want tae write lik ae URL n ye'll need yer NFC Ring.
index.readDescriptionMore: Want tae check whit's oan yer ring awreadie? Than uise this optie.
index.feedbackDescription: Love sommit or want tae chynge sommit? Than lat us ken
index.feedbackDescriptionMore: We'd love tae hear gif ye love or hate sommit. Please dae lat us ken!
action.whatDoYouWantYourRingToDo: Whit dae ye want yer ring tae dae?
option.dataWontFit: Wairnin: This amoont o data micht nae fit on yer NFC Ring
writeRing.noNFC: NFC functionalitie isna wairkin. Is NFC enabled oan yer device?
writeRing.ready: Yer NFC Ring is nou readie
writeRing.fail: No able tae write tae yer NFC Ring
settings.clearMySweetSpotDescription: Clear ma stored sweet spat location
settings.mySweetSpotDescription: Re-insert ma stored sweet spat location
help.facing: Mak sair that the coloored, non metal pairt o the ring is tichin n facing the back o yer device
help.cases: Remuiv onie cases fae yer device
help.on: Mak sair that yer device screen is oan n the device is oan (devices aften gae til sleep)
help.slowly: Muiv yer ring slawlie roond the back o yer device
help.another: Ettle wi anither NFC Device gif ye hae anither
help.winPhone: Windaes Phane needs the NFC Ring tae hae aen airtin awreadie oan. Tae fix this grab aen Android haunset or anither app n write ae URL til yer phane than ye'll be able tae uise the NFC Ring control app tae write ae URL
actions.twitter.name: Twitter
actions.twitter.description: Aen airtin til ae Twitter uiser
actions.facebook.name: Facebook
actions.link.name: Airtin
actions.link.optionText: Whit's the URL o the wabsteid?
actions.youtube.name: YouTube
actions.youtube.description: Aen airtin til ae video or channel
actions.youtube.optionText: Whit's yer YouTube Video or YouTube Channel?
actions.text.name: Tex
actions.text.description: Write arbitrie tex lik ae Bitcoin publeec key.
actions.etherpad.name: Etherpad
sweetSpot.pressTheScreen: Press the screen in the location that yer ring registerit.
sweetSpot.holdRingToPhoneByDot: Haud yer NFC Ring til the back o yer phane at the location indicated bi the coloored dots.
sweetSpot.noDataYet: It luiks lik oor awesome communitie haesna stored ae location o the NFC sweet spat fer yer phane yet.
sweetSpot.moveTheRing: Muiv the ring aroond the back o the phane ontil ye receeve ae confirmation. This can tak ae wee bit o time sae be patiant :).
sweetSpot.unableToConnect: We were onable tae connect til oor communitie sweet spat location servers. The sweet spat location will heelp ye tae identifie whaur tae haud the ring oan yer phane. Ye micht need tae turn yer Internet connection oan tae access oor servers. Thanks.
sweetSpot.looksGood: It luiks guid! Is the red dot claise til whaur the ring wairks wi yer phane?
sweetSpot.failedWrite: Failed tae write sweet spat location til database. Mak sair that ye hae aen Internet connection.
sweetSpot.yay: Yay! It wairkt. Thank ye fer bein awesome.
sweetSpot.struggling: Strugglin tae fynd yer sweet spat?
sweetSpot.askToShare: Yer ring is readie. Wid ye lik tae be awesome n heelp ithers bi shairin the sweet spot location fer this phane model?
sweetSpot.areYouSureSS: Ar ye sair that ye want tae clear yer sweet spat data?
sweetSpot.areYouSureActions: Ar ye sair that ye want tae clear yer afore-gaun actions?
